name: Shell_Salvager_Charm-Puzzle
logic: GG_Waterways + ECHOBOMB + BOMBBAG + Crossroads_10[right1] + Defeated_False_Knight + Fungus3_48[right1] + ((Waterways_13[left1] + (FULLCLAW | (ANYCLAW + (WINGS | ENEMYPOGOS)) | (LEFTCLAW + (RIGHTDASH | RIGHTSUPERDASH)))) | (Waterways_13[left2] + ((ACID + (RIGHTCLAW | WINGS | ENEMYPOGOS)) | (ACIDSKIPS + LEFTCLAW + RIGHTSUPERDASH + (WINGS | RIGHTCLAW))))) + Defeated_Dung_Defender + Waterways_15[top1] + Room_Mansion[left1]

name: Deepnest_Bomb_Bag-Challenge
logic: Deepnest_10[right3] + SPELLS>1 + LEFTDASH + RIGHTDASH + RIGHTCLAW + LEFTCLAW + WINGS

name: Edge_Bomb_Bag-Challenge
logic: (Deepnest_East_16[left1] | Deepnest_East_16[bot1]) + SPELLS>1 + LEFTDASH + RIGHTDASH + RIGHTCLAW + LEFTCLAW + WINGS

name: Spore_Bomb-Puzzle
logic: Fungus2_30[top1] + RIGHTDASH + Spore_Shroom + WINGS + (LEFTCLAW | RIGHTCLAW) + BOMBBAG

name: Power_Bomb-Puzzle
logic: Abyss_08[right1] + (PRECISEMOVEMENT | (FULLDASH + WINGS)) + ECHOBOMB + BOUNCEBOMB + SPOREBOMB + BOMBBAG + GOLDBOMB
